title: 366: Jess Visits Past Lives & Bekah is a Detective
itunes:title: 366: Jess Visits Past Lives & Bekah is a Detective
description:
(CW: death) It’s Thursday and The Broads are here to chat! They discuss powerlifting, being honest with trainers, Jess’ transformational past life regression experience, brain spotting therapy, being present, Sherri Papini, Bekah being a detective, some Bachelor moments, intimidating dads, and more!

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***FEALS: Go to FEALS.COM/CHATTY to get 40% off your first three months with free shipping!

***PILL CLUB: The Pill Club is offering a $10 donation to BEDSDIER.ORG for every Chatty Broads listener who becomes a patient at THEPILLCLUB.COM/CHATTY 

***TALKSPACE: Go to TALKSPACE.COM and get $100 off your first month with code CHATTY

***DAILY HARVEST: Go to DAILYHARVEST.COM/CHATTY to get up to $40 off your first box! 

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
